CAMPAIGN_NAME: Metal accumulation and metallothionein study in brown trout from Rugla and Naustebekken rivers
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Brown trout were captured at low water levels in June-July 1997 and early September 1998 with electric fishing and by basket traps.

CAMPAIGN_NAME: Metal accumulation and metallothionein study in brown trout from Rugla and Naustebekken rivers
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Water samples for determination of total metal concentrations taken at regular intervals, 17 times in Rugla and 14 times in Naustebekken during ice-free season May-October 1997. Previously acid-washed polyethylene bottles refilled with river water 3 times before sample collection.

CAMPAIGN_NAME: Metal accumulation and metallothionein study in brown trout from Rugla and Naustebekken rivers
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Dissolved fractions of Cd, Cu and Zn analyzed in situ by dialysis tubing with cut-off of 2.5-5.0 nm, 13 times in Rugla and 9 times in Naustebekken.

CAMPAIGN_NAME: Metal accumulation and metallothionein study in brown trout from Rugla and Naustebekken rivers
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Tissue samples digested in 65% HNO3, boiled and finally diluted in 0.1 M HNO3 before metal analysis. Water samples: concentrated HNO3 (suprapur, Merck, 65%) added to final concentration of 0.1 M.

CAMPAIGN_NAME: Metal accumulation and metallothionein study in brown trout from Rugla and Naustebekken rivers
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Metals analyzed by graphite furnace (Cd, Cu) atomic absorption (Perkin-Elmer 5100 AAS). Also Perkin-Elmer 2100 AAS equipped with graphite furnace Model HGA-700 and autosampler Model AS-70.
